message.content:
<<<api>>>: ProcessBuilder
<<<code>>>: ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder("cmd.exe", "/c", "REG ADD " + key + " /v " + name + " /d " + val + " /f");
pb.redirectOutput(new File(PathManager.getDirectory(), "log0.txt"));
int i = pb.start().waitFor();
Logger.log("ADD: " + i);
return i;
<<<explanation>>>: Instead of using the "REG" command directly, you can use "cmd.exe" with the "/c" flag to execute the "REG ADD" command. This should work on all Windows versions.
